verses.verse: And <WG1161> in <WG1722> those <WG5025> days <WG2250>, when the number <WG4129> of the Talmidim <WG3101> was multiplied <WG4129> <WG5723>, there arose <WG1096> <WG5633> a murmuring <WG1112> of the Grecians <WG1675> against <WG4314> the Hebrews <WG1445>, because <WG3754> their <WG846> widows <WG5503> were neglected <WG3865> <WG5712> in <WG1722> the daily <WG2522> ministration <WG1248>.

Then <WG1161> the twelve <WG1427> called <WG4341> <WG5666> the multitude <WG4128> of the Talmidim <WG3101> unto them, and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, It is <WG2076> <WG5748> not <WG3756> reason <WG701> that we <WG2248> should leave <WG2641> <WG5660> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316>, and serve <WG1247> <WG5721> tables <WG5132>.

Wherefore <WG3767>, brethren <WG80>, look ye out <WG1980> <WG5663> among <WG1537> you <WG5216> seven <WG2033> men <WG435> of honest report <WG3140> <WG5746>, full <WG4134> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151> and <WG2532> wisdom <WG4678>, whom <WG3739> we may appoint <WG2525> <WG5692> over <WG1909> this <WG5026> business <WG5532>.
But <WG1161> we <WG2249> will give ourselves continually <WG4342> <WG5692> to prayer <WG4335>, and <WG2532> to the ministry <WG1248> of the word <WG3056>.

And <WG2532> the saying <WG3056> pleased <WG700> <WG5656> <WG1799> the whole <WG3956> multitude <WG4128>: and <WG2532> they chose <WG1586> <WG5668> Stephen <WG4736>, a man <WG435> full <WG4134> of faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> of the Holy <WG40> Ghost <WG4151>, and <WG2532> Philip <WG5376>, and <WG2532> Prochorus <WG4402>, and <WG2532> Nicanor <WG3527>, and <WG2532> Timon <WG5096>, and <WG2532> Parmenas <WG3937>, and <WG2532> Nicolas <WG3532> a proselyte <WG4339> of Antioch <WG491>:

Whom <WG3739> they set <WG2476> <WG5627> before <WG1799> the emissarys <WG652>: and <WG2532> when they had prayed <WG4336> <WG5666>, they laid <WG2007> their hands <WG5495> on <WG2007> <WG5656> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> the word <WG3056> of 'Elohim <WG2316> increased <WG837> <WG5707>; and <WG2532> the number <WG706> of the Talmidim <WG3101> multiplied <WG4129> <WG5712> in <WG1722> Yerushalayim <WG2419> greatly <WG4970>; and <WG5037> a great <WG4183> company <WG3793> of the Kohanim <WG2409> were `Ovedient <WG5219> <WG5707> to the faith <WG4102>.

And <WG1161> Stephen <WG4736>, full <WG4134> of faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> power <WG1411>, did <WG4160> <WG5707> great <WG3173> wonders <WG5059> and <WG2532> miracles <WG4592> among <WG1722> the people <WG2992>.

Then <WG1161> there arose <WG450> <WG5656> certain <WG5100> of <WG1537> the synagogue <WG4864>, which <WG3588> is called <WG3004> <WG5746> the synagogue of the Libertines <WG3032>, and <WG2532> Cyrenians <WG2956>, and <WG2532> Alexandrians <WG221>, and <WG2532> of them of <WG575> Cilicia <WG2791> and <WG2532> of Asia <WG773>, disputing <WG4802> <WG5723> with Stephen <WG4736>.
And <WG2532> they were <WG2480> not <WG3756> able <WG2480> <WG5707> to resist <WG436> <WG5629> the wisdom <WG4678> and <WG2532> the spirit <WG4151> by which <WG3739> he spake <WG2980> <WG5707>.

Then <WG5119> they suborned <WG5260> <WG5627> men <WG435>, which said <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG3754> We have heard <WG191> <WG5754> him <WG846> speak <WG2980> <WG5723> blasphemous <WG989> words <WG4487> against <WG1519> Mosheh <WG3475>, and <WG2532> against 'Elohim <WG2316>.

And <WG5037> they stirred up <WG4787> <WG5656> the people <WG2992>, and <WG2532> the elders <WG4245>, and <WG2532> the scribes <WG1122>, and <WG2532> came upon <WG2186> <WG5631> him, and caught <WG4884> <WG5656> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> brought <WG71> <WG5627> him to <WG1519> the council <WG4892>,

And <WG5037> set up <WG2476> <WG5627> false <WG5571> witnesses <WG3144>, which said <WG3004> <WG5723>, This <WG5127> man <WG444> ceaseht <WG3973> <WG5731> not <WG3756> to speak <WG2980> <WG5723> blasphemous <WG989> words <WG4487> against <WG2596> this <WG3778> holy <WG40> place <WG5117>, and <WG2532> the Torah <WG3551>:

For <WG1063> we have heard <WG191> <WG5754> him <WG846> say <WG3004> <WG5723>, that <WG3754> this <WG5126> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> of Natzeret <WG3480> shall destroy <WG2647> <WG5692> this <WG3778> place <WG5117>, and <WG2532> shall change <WG236> <WG5692> the customs <WG1485> which <WG3739> Mosheh <WG3475> delivered <WG3860> <WG5656> us <WG2254>.

And <WG2532> all <WG537> that sat <WG2516> <WG5740> in <WG1722> the council <WG4892>, looking stedfastly <WG816> <WG5660> on <WG1519> him <WG846>, saw <WG1492> <WG5627> his <WG846> face <WG4383> as it had been <WG5616> the face <WG4383> of an angel <WG32>.
